title: Team Trump's Security Clearance Scandal & Miami's Spring Break Problem | Marsai Martin
itunes:title: Team Trump's Security Clearance Scandal & Miami's Spring Break Problem | Marsai Martin
description:
A whistleblower speaks out about improper security clearances in the Trump administration, spring break goes berserk in Miami, and actor Marsai Martin chats about "Little."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
